This policy applies to full time employees, contractual personnel, and authorized service providers working within covered offices. I, POLICY STATEMENT 1. Compliance: All offices shall follow this policy and maintain auditable records for three fiscal years. 2. Roles: Department heads ensure dissemination; unit coordinators monitor adherence and escalate exceptions. 3. Documentation: Requests and approvals must use the prescribed forms and digital tracking system. 4. Timelines: Standard processing time is five (5) working days unless higher authorization is required. 5. Monitoring: The Administrative Affairs Division reviews metrics quarterly and recommends revisions. October 13, 2024 Page 19 of20
